name: Candy Maker
description:
Welcome to the world of Сandy Market!The world plunged into a gray and boring life.
The state has banned all kinds of sweets and joys of life. Here is the life of a manufacturer of amusement substances.
You can plunge into the wide functionality of the game, completely regulate the entire process of creating various substances and learning new technologies.
You will be presented with a city map with various districts and points of sale, and much more!
See for yourself! But also, with every purchase the game will grow, updates are just around the corner!

My game offers a lot of possibilities that are associated with the production and creation of candy.
Also, some features will be added during game updates. In the game, you can buy certain ingredients,
mixing which you can get different types of sweets, and having already produced a candy in a special laboratory,
it can be sold to the buyer. With each new production of candies, you increase your level, with which you can
research new types of laboratories, candies and ingredients. The research tree is huge, with many types of candies and ingredients.
Also, after accumulating a certain amount of money, you can buy an already huge room where you can produce sweets on an industrial scale.
With each sale of candy, you increase the interest of the police in you, so you need to be extremely careful not to fall into their hands.
At this point, the game may end if the cops break into your house.

Features of the game:
- Freedom to create types of sweets
- Various indicators that you adjust
- A huge number of types of sweets
- Huge amount of ingredients
- Ability to buy industry

Plans for the future:
- Increase the number of types of sweets
- Add the ability to fight with groups
- Ability to influence the candy market
- Hire workers
- Build fields and other objects
- Introduce a small political system
- Create interaction with the police
- Create many locations
- Improve graphics
- Add hierarchy
- Improve AI
